channel.title: TragedyScape [PK] [Eco] [VPS] [Webclient] [Website] [New] [Updated]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2mph1rq.jpg[/img]
[b]Our Server[/b] TragedyScape is a Runescape Private Server dedicated to PK and Economy. It is run by a highly experienced owner and his brother, who code and do all of the work needed to run a server. Everything is fair at TragedyScape; even donators do not have special PK ruining abilities like on some servers. We are also hosted on a VPS for 24/7 uptime.
[b]PK’ing[/b] Some Features: You can toggle old RS hits and 10x hits. There is an awesome PKP shop. Perfect weapon timings so you get that beloved RS feel. No weapons are overpowered, we believe in fairness. And much more that you’ll have to play to see!
[b]Features[/b] Flawless Staking 634 Items/Anims PvP Armor and Curses New F Keys No Dupes Good Stability Good Economy, Built Around PK’ing 24/7 VPS Hosted Great Donator Benefits Dungeoneering Gear Perfect Rushing Bosses Skilling No NPC Combat Turmoil and Soul Split Work Perfectly Fast Donator System Spirit Shield Are Working Webclient DL Client Forums Buy and Sell 50 in Shops Perfect Item Dropping for Drop Parties! PKP Store Donor Credit Store Much, Much More! Graphics All graphics are 508-634.
[b]Donate, Vote, and Apply For Staff[/b] http://tragedyscape-rsps.webs.com/forums
[b]Play Here[/b] http://tragedyscape-rsps.webs.com
[b]Hosting[/b] On a 24/7 VPS With 100% Uptime. Don’t Believe Us? Look At Our Uptime On Mopar! [b]Server Creation[/b] The server was worked on for a rather long time before being released on the status page on the 16th of June, 2012. [b]Pictures[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/10p146a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/122ets0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2kg4k2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/p94c8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34yep9f.png[/img][/center] Updated Once, 7/22/12

item.description:
@Turmoilz1337x wrote:

[center]

Our Server
TragedyScape is a Runescape Private Server dedicated to PK and Economy. It is run by a highly experienced owner and his brother, who code and do all of the work needed to run a server. Everything is fair at TragedyScape; even donators do not have special PK ruining abilities like on some servers. We are also hosted on a VPS for 24/7 uptime.

PK’ing
Some Features:
You can toggle old RS hits and 10x hits.
There is an awesome PKP shop.
Perfect weapon timings so you get that beloved RS feel.
No weapons are overpowered, we believe in fairness.
And much more that you’ll have to play to see!

Features
Flawless Staking
634 Items/Anims
PvP Armor and Curses
New F Keys
No Dupes
Good Stability
Good Economy, Built Around PK’ing
24/7 VPS Hosted
Great Donator Benefits
Dungeoneering Gear
Perfect Rushing
Bosses

No NPC Combat
Turmoil and Soul Split Work Perfectly
Fast Donator System
Spirit Shield Are Working

Forums

Perfect Item Dropping for Drop Parties!

Much, Much More!
